item.title: Books I read and liked
item.description: Since 2018, I share the books I read and liked in this section (when I don’t really like a book I just stop reading it). As this section is a personal one, most of its content is written in French. 2020 Aurevoir La-haut   Pierre lemaitre   roman   A venir L'Élégance du hérisson   Muriel Barbery   roman   Article Wikipedia   Je suis tombé sur ce livre et comme on m'en avait déjà parlé, j'ai décidé de le lire.

item.title: Movies and Series I watched and liked
item.description: Since late 2018, I share the movies ans series I watched and liked in this section. Note that images are links to the movies/series webpage available on Rotten Tomatoes. 2020 2019 2018
